trans-unit.source: Extends design-time behavior for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml" /> Web server control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml" /> 웹 서버 컨트롤의 디자인 타임 동작을 확장합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 관리되는 리소스와 관리되지 않는 리소스를 모두 해제하려면 <see langword="true" />로 설정하고, 관리되지 않는 리소스만 해제하려면 <see langword="false" />로 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner" /> control and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner" /> 컨트롤에서 사용하는 관리되지 않는 리소스를 해제하고 관리되는 리소스를 선택적으로 해제합니다.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: 호출 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A> 완료 되 면 사용 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A> 메서드를 사용하면 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner>를 사용할 수 없게 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 호출한 후 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A>에 대 한 모든 참조를 해제 해야는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner> 가비지 수집기는 메모리를 회수할 수 있도록 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner> 차지한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [관리 되지 않는 리소스 정리](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 및 [Dispose 메서드를 구현](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A>에 대한 마지막 참조를 해제하기 전에 반드시 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner>를 호출하십시오.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 이렇게 하지 않으면 가비지 수집기가 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner> 개체의 `Finalize` 메서드를 호출할 때까지 사용 중인 리소스가 해제되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A> method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A> 공용 메서드는 `Dispose()` 메서드 및 <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: The `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with `disposing` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` 보호 된 호출 `Dispose(Boolean)` 메서드 `disposing` 로 설정 `true`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 호출 `Dispose` 와 `disposing` 로 설정 `false`합니다.

trans-unit.source: When `disposing` is `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A> method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner> references.
trans-unit.target: 때 `disposing` 은 `true`, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A> 메서드는 관리 개체가 보유 하 고 있는 모든 리소스를 해제 합니다.이 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner> 참조 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A> method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A> 메서드가 호출 하는 `Dispose()` 각 참조 된 개체의 메서드.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, because the <see langword="Dispose" /> method can be called multiple times by other objects, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to the <see langword="Dispose" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 재정의 하는 경우 <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />때문에 <see langword="Dispose" /> 메서드 번 호출할 수 있습니다 여러 다른 개체에서 호출 하 여 이전에 삭제 된 개체를 참조 하지 않도록 주의 수는 <see langword="Dispose" /> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)
trans-unit.target: 구현 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, 참조 [Dispose 메서드를 구현 합니다.](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)

trans-unit.source: [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)
trans-unit.target: [재정의 Finalize 메서드](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the HTML markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 디자인 타임에 컨트롤을 나타내는 데 사용되는 HTML 태그를 검색합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the HTML that is used to fill an empty control.
trans-unit.target: 빈 컨트롤을 채우는 데 사용되는 HTML을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The HTML used to fill an empty control.
trans-unit.target: 빈 컨트롤을 채우는 데 사용되는 HTML입니다.

trans-unit.source: The associated control.
trans-unit.target: 연결된 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the designer with the control that this instance of the designer is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너의 이 인스턴스와 연결된 컨트롤을 사용하여 디자이너를 초기화합니다.
